item.title: System Security Design - overview
item.description: When designing a Software System, ensuring its security is of utmost importance. A security design of any software system should consider securities between various systems (internal and external), various layers of the same system (from Data layer to view) the system & the world (Actors) During the Software Design phase, Threat Modeling should be employed to recognize any potential internal or external threats. identifies all the threats (internal and external). (This article does not focus on guidance on constructing a threat model for a system.
